channel.title: 彭博-市场
channel.description: 这是一个追踪彭博-市场news的种子

item.title: 乔-拜登总统将竞选活动的重心放在了他的旗舰产业政策--"拜登经济学"（Bidenomics）上，但这一政策在很大程度上未能引起选民的共鸣。
item.description:
President Joe Biden has centered his election campaign on his flagship industrial policy, dubbed Bidenomics, but it has largely failed to resonate with voters https://t.co/VNVrFcKT3O

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 20, 2024

item.title: 新兴市场货币在美联储会议前遭遇一年多来最长连跌走势
item.description:
Emerging-market currencies endure their longest losing streak in more than a year ahead of the Federal Reserve meeting https://t.co/YFjiwOEdHu

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 20, 2024

item.title: 加纳经济以一年多来最快的速度增长
item.description:
Ghana’s economy expands at its fastest pace in more than a year https://t.co/HbZA8nErfc

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 20, 2024

item.title: 全球最大的可可加工商之一关冲（Guan Chong）正在全球范围内寻找可可豆，因为西非主要种植国的恶劣天气和病虫害使可可豆价格创下历史新高。
item.description:
Guan Chong, one of the world’s biggest cocoa processors, is scouting for beans worldwide as bad weather and disease pummeling crops in top West African growers send prices to a record https://t.co/iQSGnLvrzX

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 20, 2024

item.title: 亿万富翁欣杜贾家族的四名成员因虐待其家政人员而被指控犯有贩运人口罪，在法官驳回其律师的论点后，对他们的审判将于六月份继续进行。
item.description:
The trial of four members of the billionaire Hinduja family charged with human trafficking over the mistreatment of their domestic staff will proceed in June after judges rejected arguments from their lawyers https://t.co/nwLD8UmvLa

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 20, 2024

item.title: 冰岛央行将利率维持在 9.25% 的 14 年高位，以继续抑制通胀，因为物价上涨被证明具有弹性
item.description:
Iceland’s central bank held interest rates at a 14-year high of 9.25% to continue taming inflation as price gains prove resilient https://t.co/0VNpknIbBS

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 20, 2024

item.title: 工业政策是美国大选的中心议题。对宾夕法尼亚州一个前制造业重镇的访问表明，拜登仍需说服选民
item.description:
Industrial policy is center stage in the US election. A trip to one former manufacturing town in Pennsylvania suggests Biden still has to convince voters https://t.co/AuXHAtHYC6

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 20, 2024

item.title: 消息人士称，联合利华正在考虑出售其在沁园的多数股份，沁园是一家中国净水设备制造商，联合利华于 2014 年以未披露的价格收购了这家公司。
item.description:
Unilever is considering selling its majority stake in Qinyuan, a Chinese maker of water purification equipment that it acquired for an undisclosed sum in 2014, sources say https://t.co/AcrkyBTOcN

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 20, 2024

item.title: 中国 2 月份的青年失业率有所上升，世界第二大经济体的应届毕业生就业市场仍面临压力
item.description:
China’s youth unemployment rate ticked up in February as the jobs market for recent graduates remains under pressure in the world’s second-largest economy https://t.co/j3du2tc5WQ

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 20, 2024

item.title: 俄罗斯的原油流量放弃了之前的涨幅，主要港口受到检修和大风的影响。@JLeeEnergy 写道：更严厉的制裁使交易更加复杂
item.description:
Russia's crude flows gave up previous gains, with maintenance and high winds hitting major ports. Tougher sanctions are complicating trading, writes @JLeeEnergy https://t.co/VpLh5qdEjg

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 20, 2024

item.title: 人们普遍预计巴西央行将连续第六次将其关键利率下调半个百分点
item.description:
Brazil’s central bank is widely expected to deliver a sixth consecutive cut of half a percentage point to its key interest rate https://t.co/IYzyijctK5

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 20, 2024

item.title: 德国的出生率降至十多年来的最低水平，专家指出这与对战争、气候变化和通货膨胀的担忧有关
item.description:
Germany’s birth rate falls to the lowest level in more than a decade, with experts pointing to fears about war, climate change and inflation https://t.co/AyMLyj8Lfv

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 20, 2024

item.title: 晨星可持续分析公司（Morningstar Sustainalytics）表示，欧洲投资银行有一定的余地扩大国防资金，而不会损害其最高的环境、社会和治理评级。
item.description:
The European Investment Bank has some margin to expand defense funding without hurting its top environmental, social and governance ratings, says Morningstar Sustainalytics https://t.co/Wo7X90hqMB

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 20, 2024

item.title: 由两兄弟创办的医疗图像交换初创公司已从德勤、三星、Round13、Radical 等公司融资 3300 万美元。总部位于多伦多的 PocketHealth 利用人工智能为患者和连锁医院提供个性化、流畅的体验 @商业 @技术 #AI
item.description:
A medical image exchange startup founded by two brothers has raised $33M from Deloitte, Samsung, Round13, Radical & others. Toronto-based PocketHealth uses AI to personalize, smoothen experience for patients & hospital chains @business @technology https://t.co/HJr7Wdvc2j#AI pic.twitter.com/AmwWns6S0s

— Saritha Rai (@SarithaRai) March 20, 2024

item.title: 德克萨斯州永久学校基金决定撤资 85 亿美元，这让贝莱德大吃一惊--即使是在共和党各州反 ESG 斗争的新闻不断的情况下
item.description:
Texas Permanent School Fund's decision to pull $8.5 billion came as a surprise to BlackRock — even amid a steady drumbeat of news surrounding Republican states’ anti-ESG fight https://t.co/eJolZVAqDs

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 20, 2024

item.title: 欧盟提出一项计划，利用被制裁的俄罗斯中央银行资产的收益来帮助满足乌克兰的军事需求
item.description:
The EU offers a plan to to help fund Ukraine’s military needs with proceeds from sanctioned Russian central bank assets https://t.co/AlzJa1T7MC

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 20, 2024

item.title: 欧洲央行行长克里斯蒂娜-拉加德（Christine Lagarde）表示，欧洲央行在 6 月份可能采取首次行动后，无法承诺进一步降低借贷成本。
item.description:
The ECB can’t commit to further reductions in borrowing costs after a likely first move in June, according to President Christine Lagarde https://t.co/FONCZf4Xv5

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 20, 2024

item.title: 腾讯营收不及预期，再次表明中国经济复苏乏力对其游戏和社交媒体业务组合造成了影响
item.description:
Tencent’s revenue missed estimates, in another sign that China’s faltering economic recovery is taking a toll on its gaming and social media portfolios https://t.co/wVBjriAqBe

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 20, 2024

item.title: 挪威政府正试图从外逃的亿万富翁身上榨取更多税收
item.description:
Norway's government is trying to drag more tax revenue out of the fleeing billionaires https://t.co/37dWu3MNe1

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 20, 2024

item.title: 穆巴达拉希望在其首次以美元计价的伊斯兰债券销售中筹集约 10 亿美元，因为这家阿布扎比基金希望利用投资者对这种债务需求的增长。
item.description:
Mubadala wants to raise about $1 billion in its first dollar-denominated Islamic bond sale, as the the Abu Dhabi fund seeks to take advantage of increased investor demand for the debt https://t.co/ySBrM6EAzW

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 20, 2024

item.title: 一项最新调查显示，大多数德国企业高管认为欧盟已经失去了作为经商之地的吸引力
item.description:
Most German executives think the EU has lost attractiveness as a place for doing business, according to a new survey https://t.co/gkm4NcggQA

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 20, 2024

item.title: 芬兰连续第七年蝉联全球 "最幸福国家 "榜首，美国首次跌出前 20 名之外
item.description:
Finland retains its position as the world's "happiest country" for the seventh year, with the US falling outside the top 20 for the first time https://t.co/XLM5JJK52q

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 20, 2024

item.title: 随着泰国银行开放申请，泰国最大的商业集团正在争夺该国新的虚拟银行执照
item.description:
Thailand’s largest business groups are vying for the country’s new virtual bank licenses as the Bank of Thailand opens applications https://t.co/UlwtkTh7r1

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 20, 2024

item.title: 法国奢侈品集团开云集团（Kering）警告称，其最大品牌古驰（Gucci）第一季度的销售额下降了约 20%，开云集团股价随之下跌。
item.description:
Kering shares tumble after the French luxury group warned that sales at Gucci, its biggest brand, have fallen about 20% in the first quarter https://t.co/YIdGgJMyXa

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 20, 2024

item.title: 消息人士称，中国计划主要通过银行间市场公开拍卖而非定向销售的方式发行特别超长主权债券
item.description:
China plans to issue its special ultra-long sovereign notes mainly through public auctions in the interbank market rather than through targeted sales, sources say https://t.co/zW1rTsxHm1

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 20, 2024

item.title: 台湾投资者正准备在未来一年采取更紧缩的货币政策，因为潜在的电价上涨会推高岛内的通胀预期
item.description:
Taiwanese investors are bracing for a tighter monetary policy over the coming year as a potential increase in power prices pushes up inflation expectations on the island https://t.co/aCmeStN3fH

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 20, 2024

item.title: 韩国政府周三宣布了明年医学院增加的招生配额，尽管实习医生不断抗议，但政府仍继续推进扩招计划。
item.description:
South Korea’s government announced Wednesday the allocation of its increased enrollment quotas at medical schools for next year as it pressed ahead with the expansion despite an ongoing protest by trainee doctors. https://t.co/v21R5s1dC1

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 20, 2024

item.title: 南非通胀率攀升至四个月来的新高，很可能巩固央行下周继续按兵不动的决心
item.description:
South Africa’s inflation rate climbed to a four-month high, likely cementing the central bank’s resolve to keep borrowing costs on hold next week https://t.co/CR5sYnObYw

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 20, 2024

item.title: 塞浦路斯最大的贷款机构塞浦路斯银行在大幅飙升后，正加大投资者赔付力度
item.description:
Bank of Cyprus, the country’s largest lender, is stepping up investor payouts after a steep jump https://t.co/MaVOBhU7Gi

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 20, 2024

item.title: 位于迪拜郊区的可持续城市是一个拥有 600 套住房的开发项目，旨在成为更加可持续的生活蓝图。它仍然只是一个异常现象
item.description:
Sustainable City, a 600-home development on the outskirts of Dubai, was meant to be a blueprint for more sustainable living. It’s still just an anomaly https://t.co/fubmXVhcrD

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 20, 2024
